name: GPT-UA
title: GPT-UA - free ChatGPT assistant

errors.internal: Sorry, an unknown error occurred. Please try again.
errors.notEnoughDetails: Please provide more details for your request.
errors.only280CharsSupported: In this mode, keep questions under 280 characters.
errors.insecureContext: This feature is only available in a secure context (HTTPS) in some or all supported browsers.

budget.donate: 🚨 OpenAI charges around $0.005 per answer. The site author helps fund this, but due to the high user volume, it's often insufficient. Please consider contributing - it's automated and easy.  🙏

requestSummary: So far, you have made {{requestsNum}} request(s), costing approximately ${{costUSD}} (≈ {{costUAH}}₴).
topUpQuestion: Have you topped up the website's budget?
chipTooltip: This is the amount of money from the website's shared budget that you have spent.

mode.noteResearch: Research mode browses information online to check your claims; usually takes longer.
mode.noteScience: Science mode uses Wolfram Alpha to solve your task; usually takes longer.
